PageTitle: display bgp multicast routing-table dampening parameter
FuncDef: The display bgp multicast routing-table dampening parameter command displays MBGP route dampening parameters.
CLIs: display bgp multicast routing-table dampening parameter
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table dampening parameter
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp multicast routing-table dampening parameter command displays MBGP route dampening parameters.
